page.title: 01STRENSHAM AREA 03880240
page.content: The area covered includes parts of the Civil Parishes of Eckington, Defford, Strensham and Hill Croome in the County of Hereford and Worcester. The area is divided up by the{M5 Motorway,{River Avon}and the main line railway from the north to the south passing through. This makes travelling in the area difficult. The land is{rural}and includes mixed farms, grassland and commonland. The amenities for the area are very poor, there being no shops, post office, schools or any kind of 'bus service. There is little housing and what there is are isolated farmhouses or houses in little groups. The{churches}at Strensham and Hill Croome are both very old and isolated.
